<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="">
[Prismatic Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=838)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 75

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

Shield-sized shards of multicolored light manifest in the air around you, each rotating quickly to intercept attacks. Melee attacks against you impact a randomly colored shard, subjecting the attacker to a random effect from [_prismatic spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), with a saving throw of the type indicated in that spell. The shards automatically block physical ranged attacks the size of a [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) or smaller, such as [arrows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=83), [bolts](/Weapons.aspx?ID=81), and [javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71). You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against attacks with larger ranged weapons. Any spell that targets you requires the caster to succeed at a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against your spell DC, or it fails to affect you.
